name: Axial Resistor
description: Standard through-hole axial resistor. Value is chosen by the agent at design time based on circuit needs (e.g., current limiting for LEDs: R = (Vsupply - Vled) / Iled). Body length varies with power rating but pin spacing is fixed at 10mm.

pins.label: Lead 1
pins.description: Non-polarized. Either lead can be input or output.

pins.label: Lead 2
pins.description: Non-polarized. Either lead can be input or output.

resistance_ohms.description: Resistance value, chosen by agent at design time
